title: Search All Food
description: Search all food content with one call. That includes recipes, grocery products, menu items, simple foods (ingredients), and food videos.

offset.Name: offset
offset.Description: The number of results to skip (between 0 and 990).

number.Name: number
number.Description: The number of expected results (between 1 and 100).

quota:
Calling this endpoint requires 3 points and 0.01 points  per result returned. 
    Learn more about quotas.
